item.title: Intro - How To SRE
item.description: IntroThis is a series of posts I hope to keep updating as I progress through my own SRE journey. I am currently a lowly DevOps engineer by title but as we know DevOps is a methodology not really a title. I hope to show how I have implemented Site Reliability Engineering practices in my org and more importantly how I got people to care about it. I have a good opportunity to show the benefits of SRE with a brand new SAAS project I was asked to been the “DevOps” for.
